name: Percy FAVORS, Petitioner v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS and the Pennsylvania Board of Probation and Parole, Respondents
name_abbreviation: Favors v. Pennsylvania Department of Corrections

parties: Percy FAVORS, Petitioner v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS and the Pennsylvania Board of Probation and Parole, Respondents.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 13th day of August, 2009, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal, treated as a Petition for Review, is DENIED,
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
Percy FAVORS, Petitioner v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS and the Pennsylvania Board of Probation and Parole, Respondents.
No. 101 EM 2009.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Aug. 13, 2009.
